short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Close the current tab and go to a random tab in the window

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have lots of tabs open? But not sure which ones you should go through, this is the extension for you!

Great when you have a lot of video tabs open, but you don't want to narrow yourself down a single related video rabbit hole, you can let fate decide for you instead.
